name: Water-based Varnish ChemTech A2901
description: Along with special effect materials, ChemTech offers high-performance water-based varnish for wallpaper industry produced in-house and sourced from leading manufacturers. They are suitable for gravure, flexographic and rotary screen printing on paper, fleece and vinyl printing materials. Products are lightfast, highly thermally stable, wash-resistant, suitable for hot-embossing on vinyl and inhibitor printing. Water-based varnish is available with different performance and optical properties, which can be customized when requested.
